Title: Sharknado 4: The 4th Awakens
Genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Horror, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Actors: Ian Ziering, Tara Reid, Masiela Lusha, Cody Linley
Plot: It's been five years since the last Sharknado that devastated Washington, D.C. and the world is benefiting from this hard-earned peace. Aston Reynolds' tech company Astro-X with their revolutionary atmosphere stabilizers called Astro-Pods, managed to eradicate all possible Sharknado formations, before they could get the chance to grow in magnitude. Fin, is heading to Vegas for a family reunion, some fun and relaxation, but before long, menacing clouds are forming once again and a brand new Sharknado is at hand.
